_meanings:
{@--5@} To agree or consent to, act up
to; {#tanmanyasya mama vacanaM#} <ls>Mk. 8.</ls>

{@--7@} To
intend, wish or hope for.

{@--8@} To
set the heart or mind on.

To honour,
esteem, respect, pay respect to,
value; {#mAnyAn mAnaya#} <ls>Bh. 2. 77</ls>;
(<ab>Atm.</ab>) to esteem one-self 
highly, prize highly.

{@--1@} To reflect upon, examine, 
investigate, inquire into.
